CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The device efficiency initially increases upon the incorporation of longer alkyl side chains from decyl to tetradecyl reaching a maximum at tetradecyl-substituted PffBB-14 and then declines with further alkyl side chain extension.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| decyl |
| tetradecyl-substituted PffBB-14 |

Note: I'm assuming that "PffBB-14" is a specific material name, and "decyl" and "tetradecyl" are alkyl groups that are part of the material names. If "PffBB-14" is not a material name, then there would be no valid entities in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Based on the context of the paragraph, the only clear "Material Name" entity is:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| tetradecyl-substituted PffBB-1
